DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate Diabetes management program hand potential user , health care professional lay person .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation GLUCOFACTSÂ® Deluxe Diabetes Management System
DOC.detailed_description: Diabetes data management program upload glucose meter result computer provide information home lay people diabetes healthcare professional manage diabetes . The study evaluate subject ' success use software program blood glucose meter perform specific task , upload meter result , change program meter setting , display report . The study also evaluate system 's ease use acceptability product labeling .
DOC.criteria: Lay user must : Be least 18 year age ( least 80 % must 55 year less ) Have diabetes parent legal guardian child diabetes routinely test blood sugar home Be test blood sugar home least twice daily least one month parent legal guardian child test blood sugar home least twice daily least one month Be able speak , read , understand English Have experience use PC program browse internet Have utilize diabetes management software home last year ( least 75 % lay user ) familiar diabetes management software HCPs must : Have experience use diabetes data management software medical office assist patient ' diabetes disease management use software Person work competitive medical device company Person cognitive disorder condition , opinion investigator , would put person risk compromise integrity study .
